name: Gaurav Singhal
description: Gaurav holds joint MSc degrees in Economics and Information Science from Michigan, and was previously the inaugural Lead Data Scientist at the United Nations World Food Programme.

name: Dr. Laurence E. Day
description: Laurence holds a PhD in Computer Science PhD from Nottingham, and was previously a risk analytics software engineer at Standard Chartered Bank specialising in functional programming.

name: Nupur Joshi
description: Nupur holds an MBA from Wharton, and was previously a McKinsey & Company multi-stakeholder strategy and operational transformation consultant.
